steps.name: Login
steps.goal: Login with user 'standard_user' and password 'secret_sauce'

steps.name: Sort
steps.goal: Sort the products by 'Price (high to low)' using the dropdown

steps.name: Add Items
steps.goal: Add the first two most expensive items to the cart

steps.name: Remove Item
steps.goal: Go to the cart and remove the 'Sauce Labs Onesie' (or the cheaper item) from the list

steps.name: Checkout Info
steps.goal: Click Checkout and fill the form (First: 'John', Last: 'Doe', Zip: '12345'), then click Continue

steps.name: Finalize
steps.goal: Click Finish and verify the 'Thank you for your order!' message appeared

steps.name: Add to Cart
steps.goal: Add 'iPhone 12' to the cart

steps.name: Checkout
steps.goal: Click the Checkout button

steps.name: Login
steps.goal: Type username 'demouser' and password 'testingisfun99', then click Log In

steps.name: Shipping Address
steps.goal: Type address info (First Name: 'Test', Last Name: 'User', Address: '123 Main St', State: 'State', Postal Code: '12345') and click Submit

steps.name: Fill Personal Info
steps.goal: Fill the first name 'John' and last name 'Doe'

steps.name: Fill Contact
steps.goal: Enter email 'john@test.com' and mobile number '1234567890'

steps.name: Select Gender
steps.goal: Select 'Male' gender radio button

steps.name: Submit Form
steps.goal: Click the Submit button

steps.name: Fill Registration
steps.goal: Fill the registration form with First Name 'Test', Last Name 'User', Address '123 Main St', City 'Boston', State 'MA', Zip '02101', Phone '555-1234', SSN '123-45-6789'

steps.name: Set Credentials
steps.goal: Enter Username 'testuser123' and Password 'password123', then confirm password

steps.name: Submit
steps.goal: Click the Register button

steps.name: Search
steps.goal: Type 'Trump is crazy' in the search box and press Enter

steps.name: Verify Results
steps.goal: Verify that correct search results are displayed on the page

steps.name: Search Wine
steps.goal: Search for 'San Marzano 62 Anniversario Primitivo di Manduria Riserva 2019'

steps.name: Select Wine
steps.goal: Click on the San Marzano 62 Anniversario Primitivo di Manduria Riserva wine from the search results

steps.name: Adjust Quantity
steps.goal: Adjust the quantity to exactly 3 bottles. Look at the current number in the quantity picker and click '+' or '-' until it shows 3.

steps.name: Add these three bottles to the cart
steps.goal: Add these three bottles to the cart

steps.name: Go to Cart
steps.goal: Go to the shopping cart

steps.name: Verify Cart
steps.goal: Verify that 'San Marzano 62 Anniversario' wine appears in the cart with quantity 3

steps.name: Search for 'AI'
steps.goal: Type 'AI' in the search box and press Enter

steps.name: Filter by 'Past 24h'
steps.goal: Change the time filter to 'Past 24h'

steps.name: Verify Content
steps.goal: Verify that search results related to AI are visible

steps.name: Start Loading
steps.goal: Click the 'Start' button

steps.name: Wait for Finish
steps.goal: Wait for the loading bar to disappear and 'Hello World!' to appear

steps.name: Search Repo
steps.goal: Click search and type 'microsoft/playwright', then press Enter

steps.name: Select Result
steps.goal: Click on the main 'microsoft/playwright' repository link

steps.name: Check stars
steps.goal: Verify that the star count is visible on the page

steps.name: Private Search
steps.goal: Search for 'Why is privacy important?'

steps.name: Verify Result
steps.goal: Ensure that DuckDuckGo's 'Bang' or privacy shield information is visible
